statements: DELETE FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
DELETE FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND order_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM purchase_orders WHERE status='pending' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND supplier_name LIKE '%Company%';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1000 AND product_id = 2000;
